1.0.name: wordpress/placewidget-for-wordpress
1.0.description:
People love you on Foursquare, you've got the hottest place to hang out in town. Why not show it off? Add a Foursquare venue widget to your website and everyone can see how popular your place is and read the tips people have left.

This plugin simplifies the process of creating and adding a PlaceWidget from PlaceWidget.com to your Wordpress blog. You can configure your PlaceWidget right in the Wordpress Dashboard, then embed it in your sidebar with a standard Wordpress widget.
